"Protect: Energized crystals!":
"Protect the energized crystals for a set time.
Fail if two are destroyed."
"Protect the energized crystals for a set time!"

"PSE frequency boosted by the
effect of the crystals!"

"The power of the energized crystal
at $(0) is fading!"

"Everyone, please defend the
energized crystals! Please be
aware that crystal power will
fade if no ARKS are nearby!"

"/face2 Defense was a success! With
the photon activation, PSEs
are more likely to occur!"

"/face4 Too many energized crystals
have been destroyed. Please,
return to your mission."

"The Energized crystal at $(0)
has been broken! Please
protect the other crystals!"

"Only a few energized crystals
remain! Please, find a way
to protect them!"

"New energized crystals have
appeared! We request that you
protect them! Protect most of
them and the situation will
change for the better!"

"Everybody, protect the crystals to
the end. Their power will decay if
there's no ARKS around. Be careful."

"OK, that was a success. Photon
activation confirmed. The chance of
PSEs occuring has shot right up."

"Too many crystals were destroyed...
Well, there's nothing more we can
do. Please, return to your mission."

"Looks like the $(0) energized
crystal got broken. Don't let it
happen to the other ones."

"There's only a few
energized crystals left.
Defend and protect them."

"New energized crystals...
Protect them if at all possible.
Expect things to look up should
you save most of them."

"Ah, energized crystals! If you don't
stay close to them, their power
will disappear and they'll break!"

"/face2 A great success!
Photon activation confirmed! Lots
and lots of PSEs should occur now!"

"/face4 Too many crystals were destroyed...
It's regrettable, but we might as
well give up on protecting them."

"Ohh! The $(0) energized
crystal has broken!"

"/face4 Ahh! There's only a few
energized crystals left!"

"/face2 Ohh! New energized crystals! Please
protect them as well! Defend them
and something good will happen!"

"励起結晶を守ってください！
結晶付近にアークスがいないと
結晶の力が減衰してしまいますよ！"

"守りきりました！
もう大丈夫です、これでフォトンが
活性化してＰＳＥ起こし放題ですよ！"

"励起結晶、壊されすぎましたね……
仕方がありません、気持ち切り替えて
通常任務に戻りましょう。"

"あっ、$(0)の
励起結晶が壊れてしまいました！
他の結晶を守ってください！"

"励起結晶、残りわずかです！
それだけでも守りきりましょう！"

"おや、新たな励起結晶の出現です。
たくさん守れるにこしたことはないので
出来るだけ守っていきましょう！"
